authority to scripture, have a clearer right to consider themselves Chris-
tians. How much of traditional Christianity can you reject and still be enti-
tled  to  call  yourself  a  Christian?  This  was  a  question  I  found  extremely
difficult as I moved gradually from Christianity to apostasy.
Let‘s  turn  now  to  objections  not  so  scripturally  based.  It  is  common
among Christians to believe that God is a personal being, who created the
univers
